title: I Legally Became Draco Malfoy's Best Friend
description: In this video, Max Fosh attempts to legally become Draco Malfoy's best friend by using a bureaucratic loophole.
summary: Max Fosh navigates the legal system to become Draco Malfoy's best friend, with unexpected results.
payoff: The payoff comes when Max successfully becomes Draco Malfoy's best friend through legal means, showcasing his determination and creativity.
